posts.title: 通过github issue上传图片
posts.text: github issue 上传图片理论上是可以用的 但是看路径是以private 开头的，可能有有效时间，建个贴看看啥情况，看看下边的图片一段时间之后还是可以看的不 下边这个是上传的时候拿到的路径也试试

posts.title: markdown的使用记录
posts.text: 图片可以直接使用base64 的img标签，性能堪忧，但是能用 在线加密解密 (oschina.net)

posts.title: 将xml转为json
posts.excerpt: 使用现成包进行转换，作为一个记录

posts.title: 搭配静态博客增加一个管理页面
posts.text: 部分代码 H5部分 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748<div id="app"> <div class="spinner-border" role="status" v-if="!loading"> <span class="visually-hidden">Loading...</span> </div> <div v-else style="padding: 20px;"> <div v-if="!fileUrl&&!newFile"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="init()">重新加载</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="back()">后退</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="addFile()">新建（默认为该目录下）</button> <div>当前路径{{lujing}}</div> <table class="table table-striped"> <thead> <tr> <th scope="col">#序号</th> <th scope="col">文件名称</th> <th scope="col" style="max-width: 150px;">路径</th> <th scope="col">文件类型</th> <th>操作</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr v-for="(item,index) in mdList" :key="index"> <th scope="row">{{index+1}}</th> <td>{{item.name}}</td> <td style="max-width: 250px; overflow-x: auto;">{{item.download_url}}</td> <td>{{item.type}}</td> <td> <button v-if="item.type=='dir'" class="btn btn-light" @click="nextDir(item.path)">下一层</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" v-if="item.type!='dir'" @click="editFile(item.download_url);sha=item.sha;editPath=item.path">编辑</button> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </div> <div v-if="newFile" class="mb-3"> <label for="exampleFormControlInput1" class="form-label">请输入文件路径</label> <input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlInput1" placeholder="请输入文件路径" :value="newFile"> </div> <div v-if="fileUrl||newFile" id="vditor"></div> <div v-if="fileUrl||newFile" style="margin-left: 80%;"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-success" @click="save()" style="margin-right: 10px;">保存</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" @click="close()">关闭</button> </div> </div> </div> js 部分  { createApp, ref } from 'https://unpkg.com/vue@3/dist/vue.esm-browser.js'; import { Octokit, App } from "https://esm.sh/octokit"; createApp({ data() { return { loading: false, owner: '', repo: '', branch: '', path: 'source/_posts', token: '', user_name: '@126.com', email: '@126.com', getContentUrl: '', adddocUrl: '', /*MD文件的列表*/ mdList: [], /*加载MD文件，并进行编辑*/ fileUrl: '', contentEditor: '', lujing: '', sha: '', editPath: '', newFile: '', } }, async created() { await this.init(); this.loading = true; }, methods: { async get(url) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + url).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res) }) }) }) }, async post(url, data) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + url, { method: 'POST', body: data }).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res) }) }) }) }, getContentUrlFunction() { this.getContentUrl = `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.path}?ref=${this.branch}` }, async init() { this.getContentUrlFunction(); const result = await this.get(this.getContentUrl); this.mdList = result; console.log(this.mdList); if (this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file')) { this.lujing = this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file').path.substr(0, this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file').path.lastIndexOf('/')) } else { this.lujing = this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'dir').path.substr(0, this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'dir').path.lastIndexOf('/')) } }, nextDir(path) { this.path = path; this.init(); }, async streamToString(stream) { const reader = stream.getReader(); let result = ''; while (true) { const { done, value } = await reader.read(); if (done) { break; } result += value; } return result; }, async editFile(url) { this.fileUrl = url; const dec = new TextDecoder("UTF-8"); const str = await new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => { fetch(this.fileUrl).then(async response => { var str = await this.streamToString(response.body) console.log(dec.decode(new Uint8Array(str.split(',')))) resolve(dec.decode(new Uint8Array(str.split(',')))) }) }) this.contentEditor = new Vditor('vditor', { height: 800, toolbarConfig: { pin: true, }, cache: { enable: false, }, after: () => { this.contentEditor.setValue(str) }, }) }, save() { this.upload(); }, close() { this.fileUrl = ''; this.newFile = ''; }, back() { this.path = this.path.substr(0, this.path.lastIndexOf('/')); this.init(); }, adddoc(file) { this.adddocUrl = `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.path}?ref=${this.branch}` return `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.editPath}?ref=${this.branch}` }, async upload() { var loading =weui.loading('保存中',2000); var Upurl = this.adddoc(); var sha = ''; var hpp_githubgetdocinit = { method: "GET", headers: { "content-type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8", "user-agent": "HexoPlusPlus@1.2.0", "Authorization": "token " + this.token }, } sha = await new Promise((resolve) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + Upurl, hpp_githubgetdocinit).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res.sha); }) }) }) const octokit = new Octokit({ auth: this.token }); if (this.newFile) { let base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode(...new TextEncoder().encode(this.contentEditor.getValue()))) await octokit.request('PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}', { owner: this.owner, repo: this.repo, path: this.lujing + '/' + this.newFile, message: "message " + new Date().getTime(), committer: { name: this.user_name, email: this.email }, content: base64, headers: { 'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28' } }) } else { let base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode(...new TextEncoder().encode(this.contentEditor.getValue()))) await octokit.request('PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}', { owner: this.owner, repo: this.repo, path: this.editPath, message: "message " + new Date().getTime(), committer: { name: this.user_name, email: this.email }, content: base64, sha: sha, headers: { 'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28' } }) } loading.hide(); weui.toast('操作成功', 3000) this.close(); }, async addFile() { this.newFile = new Date().getTime() + '.md'; setTimeout(() => { this.contentEditor = new Vditor('vditor', { height: 800, toolbarConfig: { pin: true, }, cache: { enable: false, }, after: () => { this.contentEditor.setValue('') }, }) }, 100); }, } }).mount('#app')

posts.title: postgre01
posts.text: postgre 中经常使用的脚本 1234567行转列unnest(string_to_array(column_name , ','))列转行string_agg(column_name , ',') 鉴权 123permission denied for sequence XXXX_control_no_seq 重建索引 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233DO $$DECLARE table_name text; BEGIN FOR table_name IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = 'node' ) LOOP BEGIN EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE node.' || table_name || ' ALTER COLUMN "id" SET START 104001' ; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN RAISE NOTICE 'Caught an exception: %', SQLERRM; -- 捕获并打印异常信息 END; END LOOP; END $$; 循环插入数据 12345678910111213141516171819202122do $$declarev_idx integer := 1;begin while v_idx < 1000 loop v_idx = v_idx+1;insert into dbo.？( isreaded, isdeleted)OVERRIDING SYSTEM VALUE (select isreaded, isdeleted from dbo.？as tt order by id desc limit 1); end loop;end $$; 按照指定字段进行分组 并取一行 123select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by ss.?,ss.?, order by id desc) rn,* from"dbo"."?" as ss where ss.?=false and module='success') as sinfo where rn=1 删除表统计情报优化表性能 1analyze tablename 表增加索引 提高脚本执行效率 1create index i_tablename_columnname on tablename(columnname);

posts.title: js 转换 csv to xlsx
posts.text: 引用两个包 123npm i yarnyarn add node-xlsxyarn add csv-parse 代码 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556const fs = require("fs");const { parse } = require("csv-parse");const xlsx = require('node-xlsx');inputUrl='./name.csv';outputUrl='./name.xlsx';maxNum=99999;let rows = [];let excelArr = []function formatToExcel(id,row0,rowsAll){ let writeRow=[Object.keys(row0)]; rowsAll.forEach((ois)=>{ const arr=[]; for (const key in ois) { arr.push(ois[key]); } writeRow.push(arr); }); excelArr.push({name:'sheet'+id,data:writeRow});}new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => { let ids=0; fs.createReadStream(inputUrl) .pipe(parse({ columns: true, relax_quotes: true, escape: '\"', ltrim: true, rtrim: true })) .on("data", function (row) { rows.push(row); if(rows.length>=maxNum){ formatToExcel(ids,row,rows); rows=[]; ids++; console.log('第'+ ids+'次 读取10w条数据'); } }) .on("end", function () { formatToExcel(ids,rows[0],rows); console.log("已全部读取"); resolve('finished') }) .on("error", function (error) { console.log(error.message); reject(error) });}).then(o => { console.log('正在转换为excel，请稍后...\n---------------- 数据量越大时间越长'); var buffer=xlsx.build(excelArr); console.log('正在输出excel，请稍后...\n---------------- 数据量越大时间越长'); fs.writeFile(outputUrl,buffer,function(err){ console.log('转换完成，'+(err?'导出时可能出现问题，':'')+'请检查导出文件核对数据'); })}).catch(o=>{ console.log(o);})

posts.title: js 自己写油猴
posts.text: 1234567891011//jianshusetInterval(o=>{ document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-1].innerHTML=''; document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-2].innerHTML=''; document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-3].innerHTML=''; document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-4].innerHTML=''; document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-5].innerHTML=''; document.getElementsByTagName('div')[document.getElementsByTagName('div').length-7].innerHTML=''; document.getElementById('note').style='display:none'; document.getElementsByTagName('iframe')[0].style='display:none'; },8);

posts.title: frp内网穿透设置
posts.text: frps.ini 123[common]bind_port = 7000token = 12345678 启动 1frps -c frps.ini frpc.ini 123456789101112131415161718192021222324[common]server_addr = ipserver_port = 7000token = 12345678[ssh]type = tcplocal_ip = 127.0.0.1local_port = 3389remote_port = 7005# 多端口穿透[range:FTP]type = tcplocal_port = 21,50000-50010remote_port = 2121,10000-10010local_ip = 127.0.0.1# http穿透[web1]type = httplocal_port = 8080custom_domains = xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx # 服务器iplocations = / # eg：http://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/yolo/test 客户端启动 1frpc -c frpc.ini linux可以持久后台运行 12nohup ./frpc -c frpc.ini >/dev/null 2>&1 &nohup ./frps -c frps.ini >/dev/null 2>&1 & 下载地址 https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases

posts.title: js 发送邮件
posts.excerpt: js node mailer 发送邮件
posts.text: 如题 12345678910111213141516171819function(){ options.from = '@126.com'; const transporter = createTransport({ port: 465, secure: true, // secure:true for port 465, secure:false for port 587 auth: { user: '@126.com', pass: '' // QQ邮箱需要使用授权码 }, host: 'smtp.126.com' }); transporter.sendMail(options, (error, info) => { if (error) { return console.log(error); } console.log(`Message: ${info.messageId}`); console.log(`sent: ${info.response}`); });}

posts.title: 苹果装机经验
posts.slug: ld/日常/其它/黑苹果装机经验
posts.text: 第一步准备需要 先下载黑苹果镜像，并找适合的EFIefi是黑苹果引导和驱动 一般在github直接搜索芯片加 efi关键字就能找到比如我搜索的是 i38100 efi如果使用的是免驱显卡可操作范围就更大了，因为对应芯片的efi是为了核显驱动。23年了免驱的一般是amd显卡，购买偏向amd的比较好 第二步将镜像写入u盘，u盘最好最小16g 第三步 通过diskgenius 将u盘下的efi替换现在大部分用的都是oc 比较老的是用四叶草，不分贵贱。反正之后基本不会升级，升级驱动挂了基本没法用了。 还有需要把启动分区调整到300mb，都推荐300mb 第四步 u盘uefi启动按照提示装机就行，启动不了就是efi不对，换就完了，正常装机会重启一次，重启的时候也要通过u盘启动继续到装完。 第五步如果装好了就可以替换之前拷贝到u盘的efi到系统启动分区，之后启动就走的这个了 镜像选择 在x86还是 Catalina最好 bigsur 也行，再往下就没有什么优化了，装新的性能不是很好

posts.title: git排除追踪
posts.text: 一种是直接在.gitignore中声明，这种所有人都受影响，并且不自由 另一种是在隐藏文件.git 下 info文件夹 的exclude文件种增加相对路径，个人隐藏这种很舒服 但是两种方法都是在文件上传后必须从仓库提交一次删除才能排除在项目外了 1

posts.title: nodejs 读取excel 处理数据 并导出
posts.excerpt: nodejs 读取excel 并生成新的文件
posts.text: nodejs 读取excel 并生成新的excel文件 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132// 引入 node-xlsx 模块const xlsx = require('node-xlsx')var fs=require('fs')// excel文件类径const excelFilePath = './up.xlsx'const sheets = xlsx.parse(excelFilePath);const sheet = sheets[0];console.log(sheet);// 打印页面数据console.log(sheet.data);// 输出每行内容 在这里处理数据sheet.data.map(row => { console.log(row); row[4]=row[2]; // 数组格式, 根据不同的索引取数据})let excelArr = [ { //data里面是数据，一个数组一行 //column这一行是因为例子里需要一个头 name: "sheet", data: sheet.data }]var buffer=xlsx.build(excelArr);fs.writeFile('./write.xlsx',buffer,function(err){ console.log(err)})

posts.title: js 自动增加A-Z
posts.text: 自动增加A-Z最多只支持到Z 后边需要自己写代码将Z之后堵死，或者到不了这么多就不用堵了优雅最重要 1234567//需要A之后的第几个const num=String.fromCharCode('A'.charCodeAt(0) + num)

posts.title: python requests 增加header
posts.text: python requests 增加header 1234567891011import requestsimport jsonheaders = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36', "Cookie": "MUSIC_A_T=1569983286727; "}# https://music.163.com/#/my/m/music/playlist?id=3010181459x = requests.get('https://music.163.com/#/playlist?id=3010181459',headers=headers)print(x.text);

posts.title: Docker打包学习
posts.slug: ld/日常/其它/docker 打包学习
posts.text: 打包docker基本脚本 首先需要选择基础镜像。一般选择这个 是体积最小的。如果使用特殊技术就选择对应技术使用的也可以， 123FROM alpine:latestFROM node:14-alpine3.15 如果有需要可以设置时区，这个是独立项目需要的，比如我这只在本地跑一点代码 12345# 设置时区RUN apk add --no-cache tzdata \ && cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime \ && echo "Asia/Shanghai" > /etc/timezone \ && apk del tzdata 之后基于使用的技术添加包比如python 需要 python3和pip 123RUN apk add python3 py-pipRUN pip3 install requestsRUN pip3 install schedule 最后运行当前启动指令 1CMD [ "python", "jobs.py" ] 这之下是通过github action 打包docker 脚本可支持多种平台x86 arm 等 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738name: Build dockerson: push: branches: - master tags: - '*' workflow_dispatch:jobs: docker: name: Build dockers runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v3 - uses: docker/setup-qemu-action@v2 - uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2 with: install: true platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8,linux/arm/v7 - uses: docker/login-action@v2 with: username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }} password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_TOKEN }} - name: build and push in master uses: docker/build-push-action@v4 with: push: true tags: dlld0319/jobs:latest context: . platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8,linux/arm/v7

posts.excerpt: 苹果手机创建快捷地图
posts.text: 苹果手机创建快捷地图方法 高德api https://lbs.amap.com/tools/picker 腾讯地图api https://lbs.qq.com/getPoint/ 苹果手机可以通过输入经纬度定位一个地点，通过快捷指令直接启动地图 iosamap://navi?sourceApplication=applicationName&poiname=龙湖&poiid=BGVIS&lat=38.859857&lon=121.438295&dev=1&style=0

posts.title: Navicat Premium 15\16 重置试用时间
posts.text: 创建一个bat 文件即可 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354@echo offecho\echo\echo 适用于 Navicat V15 V16echo 正在清除试用信息。。。for /f %%i in ('reg query HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID') do call:checkDelCLSID %%i#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileBackup /f 1>nul 2>nul #reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileBatchJob /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileDataSync /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileExport /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileImport /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileModel /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileStructureSync /f 1>nul 2>nul#reg delete HKCR\NavicatProfileTransfer /f 1>nul 2>nulreg delete HKCU\Software\PremiumSoft\NavicatPremium /f 1>nul 2>nulreg add HKCU\Software\PremiumSoft\NavicatPremium /v "AlreadyShowNavicatV16WelcomeScreen" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /freg add HKCU\Software\PremiumSoft\NavicatPremium /v "AutoCheckUpdate" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /freg add HKCU\Software\PremiumSoft\NavicatPremium /v "AlreadyScanDeprecatedReport" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /freg add HKCU\Software\PremiumSoft\NavicatPremium\Update /v "LastCheckTime" /t REG_SZ /d 1 /frmdir /S /Q C:\Users\XXXX\Documents\Navicatrmdir /S /Q C:\Users\XXXX\AppData\Local\Temp\NavicatCloudecho\echo\echo 清除试用信息成功！echo 请重新运行Navicat。echo\pauseexit:checkDelCLSIDecho filtering %1echo %1|findstr "{CAFEEFAC-" 1>nul 2>nulset result=%errorlevel%if %result%==0 goto:eofecho checking %1reg query %1\Info 1>nul 2>nulset result=%errorlevel%if %result%==1 goto:eofecho deleteing %1reg delete %1 /f 1>nul 2>nulgoto:eof 12无限期每5分钟执行一次schtasks /create /tn test_task /tr C:\wwwroot\hexo\gitpull.bat /sc minute /mo 5

posts.title: SwitchHosts小工具
posts.text: SwitchHosts 工具可以直接修改host 通过新建host直接附加到现有的host上 但使用的技术是基于nodejs的 Electron 占用资源使用起来很难受，只用在跑特定代码的时候好了

posts.text: testtesttest Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 有点慢但不是问题
